course_description: Audition/interview required. Weekly rehearsals, Chapel leadership, tours, and concerts in the local community and beyond. A maximum of four hours of credit in CM600 may count toward elective requirements for the MDiv or MTS. A limited number of hours can count toward Area of Specialization for MRL worship and music students.
sections: Class Nbr: 4980, Section #: 1, Type: MUS, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 5-7p, Instructor: D. Daniel, Status: Open
